content:
Of course! Graz has an amazing culinary scene, and here are some options for restaurants and cafes that you can check out after your shopping spree:

1. Der Steirer: This restaurant offers traditional Styrian cuisine with a modern twist, and all ingredients are sourced from local farmers and producers. They have an amazing selection of dishes, including pumpkin seed oil soup and Styrian fried chicken.

2. Tribeka: This cozy little cafe offers delicious coffee, homemade cakes, and light bites. It has a great outdoor seating area and is the perfect place to relax after a day of shopping.

3. Aiola Upstairs: This rooftop restaurant has an amazing view of Graz and offers Mediterranean-inspired dishes such as seafood risotto and grilled octopus. It’s a bit pricier, but the view and the food are worth it.

4. Uhrturm Restaurant: If you’re looking for a more upscale dining experience, then Uhrturm Restaurant is a great option. It’s located at the top of the Schlossberg and offers panoramic views of Graz. Their menu features international and traditional Styrian dishes.

5. Cafe Promenade: This cafe is located in the heart of Graz’s old town, and it’s a great place to people-watch while enjoying coffee and pastries. They have a great selection of cakes and desserts, as well as savory dishes such as soups and salads.

I hope these suggestions help, and bon appétit!
